event.description: Yunel Escobar singles on a sharp line drive to right fielder Matt Joyce.
Kole Calhoun singles on a line drive to left fielder Khris Davis. Yunel Escobar to 2nd.
Mike Trout grounds into a double play, shortstop Marcus Semien to second baseman Jed Lowrie to first baseman Yonder Alonso. Yunel Escobar to 3rd. Kole Calhoun out at 2nd.
Albert Pujols grounds out, shortstop Marcus Semien to first baseman Yonder Alonso.
C. J. Cron flies out to right fielder Matt Joyce in foul territory.
Cameron Maybin strikes out swinging.
Andrelton Simmons singles on a ground ball to right fielder Matt Joyce.
Danny Espinosa pops out softly to second baseman Jed Lowrie.
Martin Maldonado called out on strikes.
Yunel Escobar strikes out on a foul tip.
Kole Calhoun walks.
Mike Trout homers (1) on a line drive to left center field. Kole Calhoun scores.
Albert Pujols strikes out swinging.
C. J. Cron walks.
Cameron Maybin grounds into a double play, shortstop Marcus Semien to second baseman Jed Lowrie to first baseman Yonder Alonso. C. Cron out at 2nd.
Andrelton Simmons lines out sharply to center fielder Rajai Davis.
Danny Espinosa strikes out swinging.
Martin Maldonado strikes out swinging.
Yunel Escobar singles on a sharp line drive to shortstop Marcus Semien.

Pitching Change: Ryan Madson replaces Sean Doolittle.
Mike Trout doubles (1) on a line drive to right fielder Matt Joyce.
Ryan Madson intentionally walks Albert Pujols.
C. J. Cron grounds into a force out, shortstop Marcus Semien to second baseman Jed Lowrie. Albert Pujols out at 2nd.
Pitching Change: Santiago Casilla replaces Ryan Madson.
Cameron Maybin grounds out, third baseman Trevor Plouffe to first baseman Yonder Alonso.
Andrelton Simmons walks.
Danny Espinosa lines out to right fielder Matt Joyce.
Offensive Substitution: Pinch-hitter Ben Revere replaces Martin Maldonado.
Ben Revere grounds out, second baseman Jed Lowrie to first baseman Yonder Alonso.

Matt Joyce strikes out swinging.

Khris Davis grounds out, shortstop Andrelton Simmons to first baseman C. J. Cron.

Trevor Plouffe grounds into a double play, shortstop Andrelton Simmons to second baseman Danny Espinosa to first baseman C. J. Cron. Jed Lowrie out at 2nd.
